text: Manwan Ni Hel () is the lowest point in Union Council Berote Kalan located on the right bank of the Jhelum River of Abbottabad District, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. It serves as a tripoint for the internal provincial borders of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Punjab and Azad Jammu & Kashmir. ==References== Category:Populated places in Abbottabad District Category:Internal borders of Pakistan
title: Manwan ni hell
